[url=https://twitter.com/charliekirk11][/url]
Charlie Kirk @charliekirk11 1月4日
[url=https://twitter.com/charliekirk11][/url]

How is the Mainstream Media commemorating a murderous terrorist's death?

From the New Yorker:

"Suleimani, a flamboyant former construction worker and bodybuilder with snowy white hair, a dapper beard, and arching salt-and-pepper eyebrows..."

Seriously?

These people are sick
